text:
This is awful 🤦🏽‍♀️. But sadly represent some w/ this mentality, based on the delayed actions to protect our loved ones in #LTC right here in 🇨🇦

As someone very close to my grandma, this entire #COVID19 #pandemic has sadly shown me how our gov. & others treat our elderly. #vaccine https://t.co/5Ru28ppQJR
